author: @bendgk123
text: For the pivot_left function it would be easier to call the turn_right function along with turn_left (going backwards) and vice versa for pivot_right.  Also you should add another argument to every function called direction which would save you A LOT of time for coding and then rename the function to motor_left or motor_right (or anything you really want) otherwise amazing tutorial it helped a lot!

author: @abencomo
text: Nice work, thanks for sharing!  We built a similar project.  However, we installed an Android device onto a RC car and used its camera to control it autonomously using an IOIO board. Here is the preliminary result:  http://youtu.be/vkvkfcqEUkk﻿
